links: Alois P. Heinz, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..1000
maple: with (numtheory): a:= proc(n) option remember; local d,j; if n=1 then -1 else (add (d*a(d), d=divisors(n-1)) +add (add (d*a(d), d=divisors(j)) *a(n-j), j=1..n-2))/(n-1) fi end: seq (a(n), n=1..40);  # _Alois P. Heinz_, Sep 06 2008
author: _Christian G. Bower_, Jan 04 1999
